parameter.name: messagingType
parameter.description: It must contain exactly one of the token or topic or condition value

parameter.name: dryRunMode
parameter.description: It is used to send FCM messages in the dry run mode

parameter.name: registrationToken
parameter.description: If you specify messagingType as token, you must provide this value. FCM API allows you to send messages to individual devices by specifying a registration token for the target device.

parameter.name: topicName
parameter.description: If you specify messagingType as topic, you must provide this value. Name of the topic.

parameter.name: condition
parameter.description: If you specify messagingType as condition, you must provide this value. And if you want to send a message to a combination of topics, you must specify this value.

parameter.name: dataFieldsOfMessage
parameter.description: It defines key-value pair to the message as a data field.

parameter.name: notificationTitle
parameter.description: Sets the notification information (notification title) to be included in the message.

parameter.name: notificationBody
parameter.description: Sets the notification information (notification body) to be included in the message

parameter.name: androidPriority
parameter.description: Message priority. Must be one of normal and high values.

parameter.name: timeToLiveDuration
parameter.description: The time-to-live duration of the message.

parameter.name: restrictedPackageName
parameter.description: Package name of the application where the registration tokens must match in order to receive the message.

parameter.name: collapseKey
parameter.description: An identifier of a group of messages that can be collapsed, so that only the last message gets sent when delivery can be resumed.

parameter.name: dataFieldsOfAndroidConfig
parameter.description: A map of key-value pairs where each key and value are strings.

parameter.name: androidNotificationTitle
parameter.description: Sets notification title that is specific to Android notifications.

parameter.name: androidNotificationBody
parameter.description: Sets notification body that is specific to Android notifications.

parameter.name: androidClickAction
parameter.description: Sets the action associated with a user click on the notification.

parameter.name: androidIcon
parameter.description: The notification icon.

parameter.name: androidColor
parameter.description: The notification's icon color.

parameter.name: androidTag
parameter.description: Identifier used to replace existing notifications in the notification drawer.

parameter.name: androidSound
parameter.description: The sound to play when the device receives the notification.

parameter.name: androidTitleLocalizationKey
parameter.description: The key of the title string in the app's string resources to use to localize the title text to the user's current localization.

parameter.name: androidBodyLocalizationKey
parameter.description: The key of the body string in the app's string resources to use to localize the body text to the user's current localization.

parameter.name: androidTitleLocalizationArgs
parameter.description: A list of string values to be used in place of the format specifiers in androidTitleLocalizationKey to use to localize the title text to the user's current localization.

parameter.name: androidBodyLocalizationArgs
parameter.description: A list of string values to be used in place of the format specifiers in androidBodyLocalizationKey to use to localize the body text to the user's current localization.

parameter.name: apnsHeaders
parameter.description: HTTP request headers defined in Apple Push Notification Service.

parameter.name: apnsCustomData
parameter.description: A map of key-value pairs where each key and value are strings.

parameter.name: apnsBadge
parameter.description: Include this key when you want the system to modify the badge of your app icon.

parameter.name: apnsSound
parameter.description: Include this key when you want the system to play a sound.

parameter.name: apnsContentAvailable
parameter.description: Include this key with a value of 1 to configure a background update notification.

parameter.name: apnsCategory
parameter.description: Provide this key with a string value that represents the notificationâ€™s type.

parameter.name: apnsThreadId
parameter.description: Provide this key with a string value that represents the app-specific identifier for grouping notifications.

parameter.name: apnsAlertTitle
parameter.description: Include this key when you want the system to display a standard alert.

parameter.name: apnsAlertBody
parameter.description: Include this key when you want the system to display a standard alert.

parameter.name: webPushHeaders
parameter.description: Adds the given key-value pair as a Webpush HTTP header.

parameter.name: webPushData
parameter.description: A map of key-value pairs where each key and value are strings.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationTitle
parameter.description: The title of the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationBody
parameter.description: The body of the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationIcon
parameter.description: It contains the URL of an icon to be displayed as part of the web notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationBadge
parameter.description: The URL of the image used to represent the notification when there is not enough space to display the notification itself.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationImage
parameter.description: The URL of an image to be displayed as part of the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationLanguage
parameter.description: Sets the language of the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationTag
parameter.description: Sets an identifying tag on the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationDirection
parameter.description: The text direction of the notification.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationRenotify
parameter.description: Specifies whether the user should be notified after a new notification replaces an old one.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationInteraction
parameter.description: A Boolean indicating that a notification should remain active until the user clicks or dismisses it, rather than closing automatically.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationSilent
parameter.description: Specifies whether the notification should be silent.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationTimestamp
parameter.description: Specifies the time at which a notification is created or applicable.

parameter.name: webPushNotificationVibrate
parameter.description: Specifies a vibration pattern for devices with vibration hardware to emit.
